meta.title: Get a Channel Listing - Channel Listings - Channels - Management APIs - API Reference
meta.description:
Returns a Channel Listing for a specific channel.

Authorization

OAuth Scopes



Headers



Example



For more information on Authenticating BigCommer...

blocks.data: Returns a *Channel Listing* for a specific channel.

### OAuth Scopes
|  **UI Name** | **Permission** | **Parameter** |
| --- | --- | --- |
|  Channel Listings | modify | `store_channel_listings` |
|  Channel Listings | read-only | `store_channel_listings_read_only` |
|  Channel Settings | modify | `store_channel_settings` |
|  Channel Settings | read-only | `store_channel_settings_read_only` |
|  Sites & Routes | modify | `store_sites` |
|  Sites & Routes | read-only | `store_sites_read_only` |

### Headers

|Header|Parameter|Description|
|-|-|-|
|`X-Auth-Token`|`access_token `|Obtained by creating an API account or installing an app in a BigCommerce control panel.|

### Example

```http
GET /stores/{$$.env.store_hash}/v3/catalog/summary
host: api.bigcommerce.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-Auth-Token: {access_token}
```


* For more information on Authenticating BigCommerce APIs, see: [Authentication](https://developer.bigcommerce.com/api-docs/getting-started/authentication).
* **Name**: X-Auth-Token
* **Location**: header

listing_id.description: The ID of a channel listing.

channel_id.description: The ID of the channel associated with this channel listing.

listing_id.description: The ID of the channel listing that has been created, returned, or updated.

external_id.description: Associated ID within a system / platform outside of BC.

product_id.description: The ID of the product associated with this channel listing.

state.description: The state of the product assignment or channel listing.

name.description: Name of the product for this channel listing specifically. This is an optional field that can be used to override the product name in the catalog.

description.description: Description of the product for this channel listing specifically. This is an optional field that can be used to override the product description in the catalog.

date_created.description: Date on which the channel listing was first created.

date_modified.description: Date on which the channel listing was most recently changed.

items.description: Details about a variant of the product for this channel listing.

channel_id.description: The ID of the channel associated with this channel listing.

product_id.description: The ID of the product associated with this channel listing.

variant_id.description: The ID of the product variant associated with this channel listing.

external_id.description: Associated ID within a system / platform outside of BC.

state.description: The state of the channel listing variant.

name.description: Name of the product variant for this channel listing specifically. This is an optional field that can be used to override the name of the product variant in the catalog.

description.description: Description of the product variant for this channel listing specifically. This is an optional field that can be used to override the description of the product variant in the catalog.

date_created.description: Date on which the channel listing variant was first created.

date_modified.description: Date on which the channel listing variant was most recently changed.

meta.description: Empty meta object; may be used later.

blocks.data: A *Channel Listing* with the provided channel ID and listing ID was not found.

title.description: The error title describing the particular error.

type.description: Link to a list of BigCommerce API status codes.
